title: Brady-Belichick Showdown, Mike Tirico talks Brees/Gruden, Nate Burleson, and Pigskin Picks!
itunes:title: Brady-Belichick Showdown, Mike Tirico talks Brees/Gruden, Nate Burleson, and Pigskin Picks!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Matt Cassel explain why the Bengals win on TNF could be pivotal for Joe Burrow and the franchise. We preview some marquee matchups in NFL Week 4 before NBC's Mike Tirico tells us about being on the field for Brady v Belichick in Foxborough. Nate Burleson drops by and we give Kay's top five fantasy players and Pigskin Picks.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
